In response to the recent 7.1 magnitude earthquake in Mexico, ZTE took a day off to encourage its staff to assist in post-disaster recovery and relief. We hope our support stand as a gesture of solidarity with our customers and friends in Mexico.

Yinchuan China hosted the 3rd annual TM Forum Smart City InFocus Conference this week. ZTE’s government video cloud collaboration system was presented to the conference as one of the ways to make a city truly smart.

As a leading provider of trunking solutions, ZTE showcases a widely acclaimed product at the Greece’s Expo TIF – a Portable Emergency Command System that can provide LTE coverage anywhere anytime with one click away.

If you’re at #MWCA17 , head to booth S-342 and come and meet legends like Jordan Bell and Adonal Foyle plus the Golden State Warriors’ Championship Trophy! 👀

ZTE USA has begun efforts to provide relief to the victims of Hurricane Harvey.The ZTE USA Marketing Department is now organizing a trip for a team of volunteers to cooperate with foundation Trusted World to assist with the collection and distribution of much-need supplies for the Hurricane Harvey victims. Trusted World will take the donations collected by ZTE USA and the team of ZTErs who signed up to volunteer on a ZTE truck to their location in Garland.
Here’s ZTE’s latest 5G Achievements so far in 2017 H1! Take a look at how we’re building a better future with our operators and partners.

ZTE’s new AI solution helps operators to build next-gen intelligent networks and can provide voice and video services based on face recognition, human and vehicle identification, speech recognition and Natural Language Processing (NLP) technologies.

Next stop, San Francisco: ZTE can’t wait to talk Pre5G, IoT and Big Video at MWC Americas next week. We will be at booth 342 where you’ll be able to see exciting innovations like our 1 gigabit smartphone. Come say hi!

From enhanced mobile broadband to Ultra-reliable and Low Latency Communications, ZTE are proud of their 5G achievements and we were delighted to welcome some of China’s state leaders to see for our innovations for themselves.

We’re thrilled to announce that ZTE will be providing live demonstrations of our premium video platform, from Vinsight smart operation and maintenance system to OTT low latency solutions, Multi-DRM and smart home solutions. We’ll also have some joint product releases that you will surely not want to miss out on!

We’re looking forward to hitting San Francisco in September for MWC Americas. If you’re heading to the convention, come visit booth #342 and say hi. As well as having all our latest gadgets on display, we will be talking Pre5G, 5G, mobile devices and big video!

The 5G era is fast approaching and we agree with Liu Guangyi, China Mobile Research Institute’s CTO of wireless and device development: we need to create a global, unified standard for 5G that benefits everyone.

3GPP RAN3 just elected ZTE’s Gao Yin as the new vice chairman. The group is mainly responsible for wireless access network-related content. Congrats Gao Yin!

Kudos to ZTE Ethiopia: for the 5th year in a row, the team showed that they cared about the environment by planting tree seedlings. The team planted 2,000 seedlings at Mount Entonto, home to the highest mountain peak overlooking Addis Ababa.
We’re happy to report that ZTE’s new 5G service-sensing wireless power management solution was unanimously approved after a Proof of Concept test by the Open Networking Foundation.
We are devastated to hear about the earthquakes in Sichuan and Xinjiang; we are doing all we can to restore communications to help with rescue efforts.
#ZTE & operators work together to ensure the communication system is restored for rescue operations to continue following #Sichuan #earthquake

We are cruising along in the development of our smart parking systems. Our commercially ready NB-IoT smart parking terminals will soon make finding a parking spot easier and help alleviate road congestion.
